title: Project Manager
job_overview:
Overview:
Are you someone who thrives in structure, drives execution without micromanaging, and brings clarity to chaos? We’re seeking a proactive Project Manager to lead cross-functional coordination and ensure Upgrade to see actual infontum across 20+ high-priority initiatives.

You’ll be the connective tissue between strategy and execution—working closely with leadership and an experienced on-site Senior PM to make sure nothing falls through the cracks. From tracking progress to clearing blockers, you’ll own the systems that keep everyone focused and accountable.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Project Coordination & Accountability
Keep initiative progress up-to-date through dashboards and internal reporting
Act as the central point of follow-up to remove blockers and maintain Upgrade to see actual infontum
Align execution teams with strategic goals and timelines

2. Tool & Process Ownership
Implement and manage tools like Wrike, JIRA, Smartsheet, or Google Sheets
Develop systems for documentation, tracking, and reporting
Lead the setup and cadence of Gantt charts, dashboards, and weekly reviews

3. Execution Support
Partner with the on-site Senior PM to fill capacity gaps and maintain prioritization
Identify inefficiencies and streamline workflows across departments

4. Cross-Departmental Communication
Liaise with department heads and project owners to clarify objectives
Drive onboarding and ensure roles are clearly defined
Surface risks early and communicate them with clarity

5. Continuous Improvement & Risk Management
Spot trends in delays or misalignment and implement scalable solutions
Take a systems-thinking approach to drive operational excellence

Qualifications:
5+ years of hands-on project or program management experience
Background in BPO, SaaS, or remote-first teams is highly preferred
Expertise in project management tools (e.g., JIRA, Wrike, Upgrade to see actual info, Smartsheet)
Proven track record building dashboards and performance systems
Clear, confident communicator—both written and verbal
Strong sense of ownership and ability to bring calm to complexity
Comfortable driving accountability across cross-functional teams

Company Benefits:
$500 USD Sign-In Bonus if you apply between July 10 to September 25, 2025
Competitive compensation package
Opportunity to work closely with high-level executives from various industries.
Professional growth and development.
Chance to contribute to the success and growth of our clients.
Supportive and collaborative team environment.
Paid US Federal Holidays
Paid Time Off
Healthcare Package
1 Year Travel Bonus
Year-End Bonus

How to Apply:
1. Complete the Form: Start by filling out the form at wkf.ms/3AnjFVK.
2. Video Recording: Ensure you have a professional background when recording your video.
3. Be Authentic: We strongly discourage reading from a script. Instead, be genuine and let your personality shine!
4. Email Confirmation: Make sure to provide a valid email address to receive our application confirmation. If you don’t see the confirmation email, double-check for any spelling errors and resubmit the form with the correct email.
5. Next Steps: If your qualifications meet our criteria, our Recruitment Specialist will reach out to you.
